title: Idhuvarai En Nenjai Lyrics Muran Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Idhuvarai,
en nenjai theendiyadhillai poomazhai
Mudhal murai,
nanaithu chendraai uyirin vervarai
Idhuvarai,
nirangal maariyadhillai vaanilai
Mudhalmurai,
nee vandhaai vaanavil aanadhu soolnilai

Aaanal idhuvarai,
En naatkal thanimayil veenaai ponadhu
Unnaal mudhalmurai,
En ovvoru nodiyum azhagaai aanadhu
Yenno idhuvarai,
pala mozhigal irundhum vaarthai thozhaindhadhu
Unnaal mudhalmurai,
Mounam kooda kadhaigal pesudhu

Idhuvarai,
en nenjai theendiyadhillai poomazhai
Mudhal murai,
nanaithu chendraai uyirin vervarai
Idhuvarai,
nirangal maariyadhillai vaanilai
Mudhalmurai,
nee vandhaai vaanavil aanadhu soolnilai

Kaattrile mirandidum illai rasithathillai, idhuvarai
Kaagidham asaivadhum azhagengiren naan, mudhalmurai
Kadal alai virumbiyum kaal nanaithathillai, idhuvarai
Panithuli thottadhum sugam engiren naan, mudhalmurai

Yenoo idhuvarai,
puyal vandhu modhiyum saaindhadhillai
Aaanaal mudhalmurai,
Mayil iragondru urasi aadi ponen

Yeeno idhuvarai
manam solvadhai kettkum endru irundhen
Aanaal mudhalmurai
therindhe muludhaai naan envasam elandhen

Saalayin orangal naan paarthathillai, idhuvarai
Indruthaan kaankiren poondhottangal angu, mudhalmurai
Sooriyan velichamum ennai suttathilali, idhuvarai
Minmini oliyile karaikiren naan, mudhalmurai

Yenno idhuvarai
vetkangal enmel soolnthathillai
Aanaal mudhalmurai
Indha maatram yethanaal puriyavillai

Yenno idhuvarai
vennilavum ennai theendavillai
Aanaal mudhalmurai
un vatta pottil otti kondaen

Idhuvarai,
en nenjai theendiyadhillai poomazhai
Mudhal murai,
nanaithu chendraai uyirin vervarai
Idhuvarai,
nirangal maariyadhillai vaanilai
Mudhalmurai,
nee vandhaai vaanavil aanadhu soolnilai
